info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 5:49PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rutherford and southwestern Cleveland Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 549 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Forest City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shelby, Forest City, Boiling Springs NC, Patterson Springs, Ellenboro, Lattimore, Mooresboro, Bostic, Earl and Kingstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
